ggfields 0.0.0.9000

  • Changelog

    Angle Correction

    angle_correction.Rmd
    library(ggfields)
library(ggplot2)
    north_arrows <-
  expand.grid(
    x = seq(-5, 15, length.out = 10),
    y = seq(89.85, 89.9, length.out = 10)
  ) |>
  sf::st_as_sf(coords = c("x", "y"), crs = 4326) |>
  sf::st_make_grid() |>
  stars::st_as_stars(nx = 10, ny = 10) |>
  dplyr::mutate(angle = 0*(2*pi/360))
    ggplot() +
  geom_fields(data = north_arrows, aes(angle = angle), length = 1)
#> Called from: geom_fields(data = north_arrows, aes(angle = angle), length = 1)
#> debug: if (!is.null(data)) {
#>     data <- .data_prep_fields(data)
#>     mapping <- .mapping_prep_fields(mapping)
#> }
#> debug: data <- .data_prep_fields(data)
#> debug: mapping <- .mapping_prep_fields(mapping)
#> debug: if (rlang::inherits_any(data, c("sf", "stars"))) {
#>     coord <- ggplot2::coord_sf(default = TRUE)
#> }
#> debug: coord <- ggplot2::coord_sf(default = TRUE)
#> debug: c(ggplot2::layer_sf(geom = GeomFields, mapping = mapping, data = data, 
#>     stat = stat, position = position, show.legend = show.legend, 
#>     inherit.aes = inherit.aes, params = rlang::list2(na.rm = na.rm, 
#>         max_length = max_length, arrow = arrow, .angle_correction = .angle_correction, 
#>         ...)), coord)
#> Angle correction between 0.00 and 0.00 radials

    ggplot() +
  geom_fields(data = north_arrows, aes(angle = angle), length = 1,
              .angle_correction = NULL,
              max_length = ggplot2::unit(0.7, "cm"), col = "red") +
  geom_fields(data = north_arrows, aes(angle = angle), length = 1,
              max_length = ggplot2::unit(0.7, "cm"), col = "green") +
  coord_sf(crs = 32631) +
  theme_light()
#> Called from: geom_fields(data = north_arrows, aes(angle = angle), length = 1, 
#>     .angle_correction = NULL, max_length = ggplot2::unit(0.7, 
#>         "cm"), col = "red")
#> debug: if (!is.null(data)) {
#>     data <- .data_prep_fields(data)
#>     mapping <- .mapping_prep_fields(mapping)
#> }
#> debug: data <- .data_prep_fields(data)
#> debug: mapping <- .mapping_prep_fields(mapping)
#> debug: if (rlang::inherits_any(data, c("sf", "stars"))) {
#>     coord <- ggplot2::coord_sf(default = TRUE)
#> }
#> debug: coord <- ggplot2::coord_sf(default = TRUE)

#>     inherit.aes = inherit.aes, params = rlang::list2(na.rm = na.rm, 
#>         max_length = max_length, arrow = arrow, .angle_correction = .angle_correction, 
#>         ...)), coord)
#> Called from: geom_fields(data = north_arrows, aes(angle = angle), length = 1, 
#>     max_length = ggplot2::unit(0.7, "cm"), col = "green")
#> debug: if (!is.null(data)) {
#>     data <- .data_prep_fields(data)
#>     mapping <- .mapping_prep_fields(mapping)
#> }
#> debug: data <- .data_prep_fields(data)
#> debug: mapping <- .mapping_prep_fields(mapping)
#> debug: if (rlang::inherits_any(data, c("sf", "stars"))) {
#>     coord <- ggplot2::coord_sf(default = TRUE)
#> }
#> debug: coord <- ggplot2::coord_sf(default = TRUE)

#> Angle correction between -0.19 and 0.12 radials
